hero.title: Academic Event Management
hero.description: EventHub streamlines the management of academic events, from registration to check-in, making it easier for organizers and attendees alike.

eventManagement.title: Event Management
eventManagement.description: Create and manage events with ease. Track registrations, attendance, and more.

qrCode.title: QR Code Check-in
qrCode.description: Streamline the check-in process with QR codes. No more paper tickets or manual check-ins.

realTime.title: Real-time Communication
realTime.description: Engage with event participants in real-time through our virtual lounge and Q&A system.

events.title: Events
events.description: Browse and register for upcoming academic events

empty.title: No events found
empty.description: Events will appear here once they're added to the system.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your registrations and view your event history

empty.title: No upcoming events
empty.description: You haven't registered for any upcoming events.

empty.title: No past events
empty.description: You haven't attended any events yet.
